speaker: agent
text: If you know your party's extension, dial it now.

speaker: agent
text: For existing customers inquiring about an order status or scheduled appointment, press [PHONE_NUMBER] to receive an estimate or place a new order for your home or business.

speaker: agent
text: If you have received an estimate you would like to move forward with, press para marque author [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: agent
text: I have a question to ask.

speaker: customer
text: If you guys do what I'm looking at.

speaker: customer
text: I have some windows that transom windows, fixed windows that are getting fogged between the double pane.

speaker: agent
text: There's a process out there now that can get the fog out of them without replacing or anything.

speaker: customer
text: Is that something you guys do?

speaker: customer
text: No, sir, I haven't been informed of that.

speaker: agent
text: Whenever we do have the double pains and they only need one of them, we have to do both of them in order to, you know, get the fog out or just like, replace them in general.

speaker: customer
text: Are you saying that you would replace it?

speaker: agent
text: You don't get the fog out.

speaker: customer
text: I. I don't know why somebody had mentioned fog.

speaker: customer
text: Because there is a process out there that they can.

speaker: agent
text: My neighbor had it done and I thought it was you guys that did it, but nothing I have heard of here.
